title: Great Egg Harbor River: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       The best stretch for canoeing is the 22 miles between PennyPotCountyPark and AtlanticCountyPark at LakeLenape. Penny Pot is off Route 561 along the Black Horse Pike, Route 322. You can cut the trip roughly in half by putting in at WeymouthCountyPark (Route 559 off Black Horse Pike).
